Today we have concluded the UAE's post-oil retreat, our new strategic directions have become clear and initiatives will be announced within weeks https://t.co/Z1YrdFUOW4

The presence of my brother Mohammed bin Zayed during the retreat and direct supervision on many of the discussions and his clear vision of the future of our national economy one of the most important gains of this retreat

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I was born on January 16. I celebrated my 67th birthday recently 
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: when I was born, my parents had retired from active service 
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I was dragged to school 
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I was not sure it was safe to be in school 
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I went to Kigezi college Butobere 
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I didn't last long in school 
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I resolved that I would fight for justice at that age
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I really lived not an easy life
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I came with my legs first 
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I wouldn't be here if I wasn't delivered in the health centre 
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I was in P5 when I first put on shoes 
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I must have been 13yrs 
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: my dad had come back from buganda with shoes for his wife
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I put on my mother's shoes. That was the first time my feet entered in a shoe 
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I was in secondary school when my feet first owned their pair of shoes
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: in life one has to set some gudelines
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I was a pure scientist
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I failed physics on purpose in order to go do law
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: my teachers always said I was older than my look
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I read all books in Kabale library though I am not that a reader today 
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I was born in a political family 
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I got to learn about the liberation struggle from my family 
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: our house was good but we had no door to it
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I never heard about any theft 
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: we went to Bweranyangi for drama
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

“@913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I was the lead actor when I met her
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna” when I met Jacqueline.

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I was determined to fight Idi Amin
#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

RT @913CapitalFM: @AmamaMbabazi: I was engaging in risky activities while @MakerereU

#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

#DID@kasyate @TukundaneYonna

Over the past 12 years, 1 million 500 thousand jobs have been created in Azerbaijan. Of these, 1 million are permanent jobs.
Over the past 12 years, 3,000 schools, 600 hospitals and 41 Olympic Sports Complexes have been built in Azerbaijan with the most up-to-date standards.
Over the past 12 years, 89 IDP settlements with modern social infrastructure have been established in Azerbaijan, 225,000 people have been relocated to new homes.
$ 200 billion has been invested in Azerbaijan's economy over the past 12 years. $ 100 billion of this is foreign investment.
More than 70,000 businesses have been created in Azerbaijan over the past 12 years, with 1.7 billion manat preferential loans granted to entrepreneurs.
Over the last 12 years, Azerbaijan has built a modern infrastructure of tourism, around 300 hotels and world-class resorts.
Over the past 12 years, the Baku-Tbilisi-Ceyhan oil pipeline, Baku-Tbilisi-Erzurum gas pipeline has been put into operation and the TANAP project has been launched.

Today - we lowered the price of bus fare and trains at the rate of 14%. This is another important step in a series of steps we are taking to lower the cost of living.
We launched today a global library of 1 million square feet and will include 4.5 million printed, electronic and audio books and the opening 2017 https://t.co/1BwCEdvSxT
The cost of the library is AED 1 billion and the expected number of beneficiaries is 42 million annually. The library will also print and distribute 10 million books in the Arab world
Hornbills will continue to enjoy the fruits of development and prosperity of the nation equally. https://t.co/PoCPJpTHVP
The Library will be an incubator and supporter of the Arab Readers Challenge initiative, which includes 2.6 million students in 20 thousand schools in the Arab world https://t.co/ahFi90k2O4
The library will be a book complex, a community of readers and writers, and a society of content, culture and thought
The human mind is the focus of development, the book is a tool to renew this mind, and a nation can not grow without a renewed mind and a spirit of living knowledge https://t.co/qNFGt7SqQR

We liked to start the year of reading by launching this project to send a message to everyone that we are serious about transforming the UAE into a knowledge capital and making reading a well-established societal tradition.
